alert.note: Alert for Northeast Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 3:03PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EASTERN SUFFOLK COUNTY THROUGH 345 PM EDT... At 303 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Southampton, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bridgehampton around 315 PM EDT. Sag Harbor, Noyack and East Hampton around 320 PM EDT. Southold around 325 PM EDT. Shelter Island and Greenport around 330 PM EDT. Plum Island around 345 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include East Hampton Airport, North Sea, Orient, North Haven, Water Mill and Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
